title: Secorp Industries Chooses Bluetick Inc. for Remote Monitoring
text:
Bluetick Inc. and Secorp Industries announce their new partnership.
Greensboro, NC (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Bluetick is pleased to announce that Secorp Industries is now one of their partners for providing remote monitoring capabilities for measuring hydrogen sulfide (H2S) gas and volatile organic compounds for the oil and gas fields.
Secorp Industries is a safety company that was established in 1972. They provide respiratory protection, gas detection, rescue services, safety consulting and training to oil and gas companies, as well as general industry companies.
Secorp is the oldest domestic provider of hydrogen sulfide (H2S) safety services in the oil and gas industry. Secorp provides services for drilling, workover (invasive techniques for oil well intervention), construction, production, and plant operations both on land and offshore throughout the world. During the past 40 years, Secorp has built many long-lasting relationships due to the unmatched, high-quality service and expertise in their business.
Secorp Industries has locations nationwide and internationally, which allows them to branch out to those in need of their services and knowledge of the industry.. With locations all over the world, some of their businesses are set in Alabama, California, Louisiana, Mississippi, Texas, Abu Dhabi U.A.E. and Qatar.
“We are proud to have Secorp as one of our partner companies for oilfield services utilizing the Bluetick Remote Monitoring and Controls solution” said Ken Sigmon, sales and marketing manager at Bluetick Inc.
For more information about this new partnership, stay tuned into Bluetick’s news and updates and visit their website: http://www.bluetickinc.com .
About the Company:
Bluetick Inc. provides innovative solutions to the upstream oil and gas marketplace. Bluetick’s Remote Monitoring and Control (RMC) system helps operators optimize oil and gas production, enhance environmental compliance and safety, and increase workforce performance. Bluetick’s Land Management System (LMS) software automates the entire lifecycle of permit, lease, and ROW acquisition projects, including land records administration and complete GIS mapping interface. For more information please visit our website http://www.bluetickinc.com .
